com.beepell.activity.structured
Class ForEach

java.lang.Object
  com.beepell.activity.AbstractActivity
      com.beepell.activity.structured.AbstractStructuredActivity
          com.beepell.activity.structured.ForEach
All Implemented Interfaces:
Activity, LinkListener
public class ForEach
extends AbstractStructuredActivity

The forEach activity will execute its contained scope activity exactly N+1 times where N equals the finalCounterValue minus the startCounterValue.

Author:
Tim Hallwyl
